name: ASTRO SEEKER
description:
Retro Space Game for Retro Jam 2019

Press Z and X to move your character - Controls simulate jet spurts that astronauts use.

How to survive:

Keep your ship fuelled by picking up resources and bringing them back to the ship.

Dodge asteroids.

Don't hit planets.

Optimal resolution: 640x480

The planets start to the right and top of the spaceship
